body:
- SIRIUS new versions: `6.5.3`, `6.5.4`, `6.5.5`
- fixes #17814 (+shared option)

add q-e-sirius package (SIRIUS enabled fork of QuantumESPRESSO)
add nlcglib (robust wave function optimization for SIRIUS)
title: sirius (new versions, fixes),  q-e-sirius (new package), nlcglib (new package)
